fusilli.utils.training_utils.set_logger

set_logger(params, fold, fusion_model, extra_log_string_dict=None)[source]

Set the logger for the current run. If params[“log”] is True, then the logger is set to WandbLogger, otherwise it is set to None.

Parameters:

  • params (dict) – Dictionary of parameters.

  • fold (int) – Fold number.

  • fusion_model (class) – Fusion model class.

  • extra_string_dict (dict) – Extra string to add to the run name. e.g. if you’re running the same model with different hyperparameters, you can add the hyperparameters. Input format {“name”: “value”}. In the run name, the extra string will be added as “name_value”. And a tag will be added as “name_value”.

Returns:

Pytorch lightning logger object.

Return type:

logger (object)
